member.name: T:CesarBmx.Shared.Api.ActionFilters.SwaggerControllerOrderAttribute
member.summary: Annotates a controller with a prefix sorting order that is used when generating the Swagger documentation, in order to display the controllers in the desired order.

member.name: P:CesarBmx.Shared.Api.ActionFilters.SwaggerControllerOrderAttribute.OrderPrefix
member.summary: Determines the sorting order of the controller.

member.name: M:CesarBmx.Shared.Api.ActionFilters.SwaggerControllerOrderAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Sets the sorting order prefix of the controller.

member.name: M:CesarBmx.Shared.Api.Configuration.SwaggerConfig.ConfigureSharedSwagger(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String,System.Type)
member.param: The name of the application (e.g. Fraud API)
